12666,12667,12672,12673,12675,12676,12677,13223,13224,29177,720457,1497512,1498905,2668672,2768038,2768039,2768040,2768041,2768042,2768043


--select log_id,aset_id,Kd_Riwayat,kodeSatker,NilaiPerolehan,NilaiPerolehan_Awal,(NilaiPerolehan-NilaiPerolehan_Awal)as NP,PenyusutanPerTahun from log_mesin where aset_id in(12666,12667,12672,12673,12675,12676,12677,13223,13224,29177,720457,1497512,1498905,2668672,2768038,2768039,2768040,2768041,2768042,2768043 ) and Kd_Riwayat=21--


update log_mesin set TglPerubahan='0000-00-00' where aset_id in(12666,12667,12672,12673,12675,12676,12677,13223,13224,29177,720457,1497512,1498905,2668672,2768038,2768039,2768040,2768041,2768042,2768043 ) and Kd_Riwayat=21;
update log_mesin set PenyusutanPerTahun=(NilaiPerolehan/MasaManfaat) where aset_id in(12666,12667,12672,12673,12675,12676,12677,13223,13224,29177,720457,1497512,1498905,2668672,2768038,2768039,2768040,2768041,2768042,2768043 ) and Kd_Riwayat=49 and TglPerubahan='2016-12-31';
